title: On local energy decay for solutions to the b-family of peakon equations
abstract:
This work is concerned with the long time behavior of solutions to the
$b$-family of peakon equations. We prove local energy decay of global solutions
under suitable hypotheses. Assuming the global bound of the $H^1(\mathbb R)$
norm, we show local energy decay along sequences of time in an expanding region
around the origin. If we assume nonnegativity for an initial momentum, $m_0(x)
= (u - \partial_x^2 u)(0,x)$, we show strict decay on a similar region.
Moreover, we show decay in an exterior region given the same nonnegativity
condition.
